https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cuUhsAqx37kgwVWfLSkXudXyWjk.jpg When Ben McCauley daringly introduces himself anonymously via email to his secret crush, he mistakenly sends a message to single mother Charley Anderson. Ben begins dating Chloe, but she never quite lives up to the e-mail relationship and anonymous friendship he develops with her co-worker Charley. A Crush on You
